setup_script_description: sets focus on a link before the radio group, and hides the group heading
task: navigate to first unchecked radio button in group
specific_user_instruction: Navigate to the first radio button in the group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the radio button and group.
output_assertions: Name of the group, 'Pizza Crust', is conveyed
name of the radio button, 'Regular crust', is conveyed
State of the radio button, 'unchecked', is conveyed
Position of the radio button, 1, is conveyed
Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
